contributionDescription:
As an analyst having work experience of 5 years, I worked as Business Analyst & Product Manager. Following were my responsibilities- 
Successfully led and managed a team of 10+ individuals, resulting in a 25% increase in productivity and a 15% reduction in project delivery time.
Interacted with more than 150 clients to understand their requirements and propose appropriate solutions.
Established clear expectations for team members, resulting in a 20% increase in project success rate and a 10% reduction in rework and error rates.
Led the development and launch of several new features, resulting in a 20% increase in revenue.
Conducted market research and analyzed customer needs to identify new product opportunities.
